Uses of Node in nescent.phylogeoref.reader.utility
 

Methods in nescent.phylogeoref.reader.utility that return Node
static Node PhyloUtility.getRootNode(Network<FloatEdge> network)
          Finds and returns the root node of the tree.
 

Methods in nescent.phylogeoref.reader.utility with parameters of type Node
static void PhyloUtility.attachLocationMetadata(Node node, PhylogenyNode phyNode)
          Attaches latitude and longitudes to each node.
The latitude/longitude metadata can be attached to the node in two ways.
1) Either in the OTU which is referenced by this node.
2) Or directly within this node.

Caveat: Should be called only for external nodes.
static void PhyloUtility.attachOtherMetadata(Node node, PhylogenyNode phyNode)
          Maps the various metadata properties to a phylogeny node.
This function may require a revision because a perfect mapping between NeXML and Phylogeny object doesn't exist.
static PhylogenyNode PhyloUtility.toPhylogenyNode(Node node)
          Transforms Node to a PhylogenyNode.
Does not attach the metadata.
